content: Hi there ,   I am running fb ad campaigns on % , basically you can spend as much as you want and  you only pay 70 % of the spent amount in every campaign or total spent .Every day im spending 10k -20k $+ in Facebook ads . can spend up to 100,000 $USD + daily .I need someone who wants to run big ads with big budget campaigns so he will get 30 % cheaper off the ad amount spent .Thanks pm me on telegram : https://t.me/aiojane420Mention that you are reaching from Bitcointalk.org in my telegram....... EXPECTING ONLY SERIOUS BUYERS /Accepting only cryptocurrency payments./
